name: Dream Buster
description:
Fight the evil eyes in this oniric Shooter! :D

How To Play

You can choose whether mouse controls or keyboard controls: Move with the mouse and fire by clicking or move with the arrow keys by shooting with Z.

The Story

You don't even know how and why, but you can actually access to your deepest dreams. Fight the evil spirits possessing them!

Other Random Things

If the Game takes time to load then just wait, it's normal.

Last Game of 2018, it was an amazing year and I hope to do even better in 2019! ^^

Made for Mini Jam 18, enjoy! :D
